title: Rupert Murdoch's News Corp signs major deal with AI journalism startup
description: Rupert Murdoch's News Corp has inked a deal with the unknown AI journalism startup Symbolic.ai to increase journalism productivity.Continue reading at TweakTown

title: X0PA AI Receives Official Dubai AI Seal Recognition
description: (MENAFN - EIN Presswire) EINPresswire/ -- X0PA AI, a global HR technology provider, has been awarded the Dubai AI Seal at Tier E by the Dubai Centre for Artificial Intelligence (DCAI), joining a ...

title: Global sports face challenges from ‘AI slop’ misinformation
description: The wave of AI-generated misinformation has disrupted the traditional monetisation model of sports media.

title: Global sports face challenges from 'AI slop' misinformation
description: Jan 16 : A study by AI risk management platform Alethea into the surge in artificial intelligence-generated fake content, dubbed "AI slop," has warned sports teams, leagues and fans of the risks posed by increasingly sophisticated digital misinformation.Retired NFL player Jason Kelce never said 2026 Super Bow

title: Global sports face challenges from 'AI slop' misinformation
description: A study by AI risk management platform Alethea into the surge in artificial intelligence-generated fake content, dubbed "AI slop," has warned sports teams, leagues and fans of the risks posed by increasingly sophisticated digital misinformation. Retired NFL player Jason Kelce never said ​2026 Super Bowl halftime singer Bad Bunny's critics were "a bad fit for America's future". San Francisco 49ers tight end George Kittle never ranted about slain ‌conservative activist Charlie Kirk and politics in football.
